definition: A body part located between the neck and the upper arm, commonly used for carrying heavy loads, providing support, and facilitating movement of the upper limbs. It is often associated with physical activities and can be a point of contact during greetings or displays of affection.

examples.german: Er legte seine Hand auf meine Schulter.
examples.english: He put his hand on my shoulder.

examples.german: Sie trug eine Tasche Ã¼ber der Schulter.
examples.english: She carried a bag over her shoulder.

examples.german: Ich habe eine Verletzung an der Schulter.
examples.english: I have an injury on my shoulder.
